  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/112930</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/112930</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Življenje med vojno</string>
            <string language="en">Life during war</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leben während des Krieges</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La vie pendant la guerre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vida durante a guerra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vita durante la guerra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζωή κατά τη διάρκεια του πολέμου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vida durante guerra</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Praktični primer uporabe zgodovinskih virov pri učni uri Življenje med vojno.</string>
            <string language="en">How to organize lesson on life during WW II and some worksheets to drill the presented learning material.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">druga svetovna vojna</string>
            <string language="en">world war ii</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">življenje</string>
            <string language="en">life</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gospodarstvo</string>
            <string language="en">economy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">družba</string>
            <string language="en">society</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie man Lektion auf dem Leben während WW II und 
einiger Bogen organisiert, um das dargestellte erlernenmaterial zu 
bohren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment organiser la leçon la vie pendant WW II et
quelques tableaux pour forer le matériel d'étude présenté.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como organizar a lição na vida durante WW II e 
algumas folhas para perfurar o material de aprendizagem apresentado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come organizzare lezione su vita durante WW II e 
gli alcuni fogli di lavoro per perforare il materiale imparante 
presentato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς να οργανώσει το μάθημα στη ζωή κατά τη διάρκεια 
WW ΙΙ και μερικών φύλλων εργασίας για να τρυπήσει το 
παρουσιασμένο υλικό εκμάθησης με τρυπάνι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo ordenar la lección el vida durante WW II y 
algunas hojas de trabajo para perforar el actual material que aprende.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zweiter Weltkrieg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wirtschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesellschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la deuxième guerre mondiale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la vie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">économie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">société</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">segunda guerra mundial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vida</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">economia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sociedade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la seconda guerra mondiale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">economia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ζωή</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
